attributes.action: Support and protect child carers so they may have a normal childhood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has just over one million children caring for relatives unable to look after themselves. This affects the carer in all aspects of their future career, mental & physical health and is unacceptable in a caring democratic society. All children must be allowed a normal healthy upbringing. It is the crown's responsibility to ensure the parents / relatives are properly cared for. The child must also feel safe to be able to ask for professional help without threat of removal from the family home.
